copyright_text: © 2025 Signal Preparatory School. All Rights Reserved.
why_donate_text:
<!--StartFragment-->

Your donations will help us reach a wider scope of our target group and fulfil our mission. With it, we are able to fund educational programs, buy scholastics, organise community outreaches, set exhibitions, pay school house rent, support our volunteers among others.



At Signal Preparatory School, we believe every child deserves better access and exposure to quality education regardless of their background. 

<!--EndFragment-->
why_donate_heading: Why Donate to Signal Preparatory School.
donate_subheading: Your contribution helps us make a difference. Every donation counts!
parallax_text: Your support will help us to create a better future for our community children. Join us in our mission to bring positive change through education. Every donation no matter the size create a great impact. Feedback and accountability is mandatory.
title: Donate to US
parallax_heading: Together We Can Make a Difference.
